root: ^Sorry, that took a bit longer than expected. I hope you found some way to entertain yourself whilst I was away.
^I looked around your room a bit

c-0: ^No? Now I feel bad for leaving you here for so long. Oh,
c-1: ^Did you find anything that peaked your interest?
^I found a few items of interest
^Would you like to know more about any item?

c-0: ^Ah, yeah I forgot to tell you, Basil is the name of my dog. The little cutie over there in her dogbed.
^I know it's not the most usual, but it was the first plant I got when I moved here, so it has a special place in my heart, just like her.
^I guess it can be viewed as such. Since you say you didn't look around that much, would you like me to give you a brief tour of some of the things I have?
^What would you like to know more about?

^As long as you don't do it again I suppose.
